thread.title: Onestop Internet Taps PMBC Group to Publicize Its Digital Commerce and Branding Services
thread.title_full: Onestop Internet Taps PMBC Group to Publicize Its Digital Commerce and Branding Services

author: Nathalie Nourian
title: Onestop Internet Taps PMBC Group to Publicize Its Digital Commerce and Branding Services
text:
Onestop Internet, a leading full-spectrum retail and e-commerce solutions provider, has appointed PMBC Group as its public relations agency of record. PMBC Group will be responsible for elevating brand awareness across multiple retail verticals and publicizing Onestop’s suite of digital commerce and branding services. “We’re thrilled to be working with Onestop as it continues to establish itself as global leader in digital commerce solutions,” said Ola Danilina, Chief Executive Officer and founder of PMBC Group. “Onestop is a visionary when it comes to developing and executing online strategies for retail brands across all verticals and we look forward to publicizing its services.”
PMBC Group will develop and execute a multi-faceted media relations campaign by leveraging the company’s impressive track record, compelling case studies and stellar executive experience. Public relations efforts will also be tailored to the evolving e-commerce landscape, with a particular emphasis on the fiscal year and consumer spending reports.
Onestop’s ability to function as an extension of a retail brand is unparalleled, and its progressive approach to digital branding is what its keeps clients coming back. From performance marketing to warehousing and fulfillment, Onestop tailors its solutions to meet each retailer’s unique needs on a brand-by-brand basis.
About PMBC Group
PMBC Group is a fast-growing public relations agency based in Los Angeles, with offices in Beverly Hills. PMBC is dedicated to delivering tactical, results-driven public relations campaigns that build brand value and advance immediate and long-term business goals. PMBC’s success-proven formulas are designed to navigate the modern media landscape utilizing a collaboration of new and traditional media to achieve strategic media exposure to reach key consumer audiences, industry influencers, investors and other constituents that matter to our clients. PMBC is comprised of a team of professionals of varied backgrounds from public relations, journalism, social media, merchandising, product development, venture capital, entertainment and hospitality. For more information please visit http://www.PMBCgroup.com .
About Onestop Internet
Founded in 2003, Los Angeles-based Onestop Internet is a full-spectrum e-commerce partner backed by blue-chip investors Bessemer Ventures and Fung Capital USA (Li & Fung.) Onestop provides customized end-to-end digital commerce solutions for retail brands on an entirely outsourced basis. The company’s suite of six integrated core services includes an omnichannel technology platform, performance marketing and business intelligence, brand-focused design, retail imaging and video, full-scale warehousing and fulfillment, and world-class customer care. For more information, visit http://www.onestop.com .
